s9.message: Filter preferences: Various improvements for a better overview (forum topic, forum topic, forum topic).

s8.message:
Filter composer: Removed warning when adding filters to a disabled group, a new group
    is created if no enabled group can be found for the filter.

s3.message: Adblock Plus can be installed without restarting the browser now.

s1.message: The following lists the major changes compared to Adblock Plus 2.0.3.

s6.message: Implemented element hiding exceptions (mostly useful for subscription authors).

s5.message:
Better Thunderbird integration, in particular the Adblock Plus user interface is working
    with web page tabs correctly now.

s19.message: Fixed: Context menu might suggest disabling the filter on wrong domain (forum topic).

s18.message: Fixed: The list will sometimes reload even though the current page stays the same.

s13.message: Custom About dialog has been removed, using the browser's built-in dialog now.

s12.message:
Issue reporter: Sending issue reports is no longer allowed if the filter subscription
    hasn't been updated in the past two weeks.

s11.message: Issue reporter: Force a filter subscription update when reporting a false positive (forum topic).

s10.message: Filter preferences: Fixed wrong warning message when deleting filter groups.

s17.message: Searches for {1} are accepted as well, searching for {2} is no longer required (forum topic).

s16.message:
The shortcut key for Blockable items in Firefox 15 and above is Ctrl-Shift-U now, the
    old shortcut key is no longer available.

s14.message: Fixed: Tabs on Flash and Java no longer have rounded corners in Firefox 13 (forum topic).

s23.message:
Adblock Plus can now be installed in any application based on Gecko 8.0 and higher,
    in particular Firefox 8, Thunderbird 8, SeaMonkey 2.5. Older versions are no longer
    supported, XUL-based Firefox Mobile releases like Firefox Mobile 10 aren't supported either.

s20.message: Fixed: Context menu might prevent page elements from being garbage collected (bug 727739).

s21.message: Fixed: The tooltip might get displayed on top of the context menu.

s26.message: Stopped using {1} file, it's a frequent source of stability issues.

s27.message:
Switched to asynchronous file read/write operations to improve user interface
    responsiveness.

s24.message: Filter subscriptions can set their title automatically using {1} comment (forum topic).

s25.message:
Improved memory use and performance, especially fixed the regression in Firefox 15 and
    above.

s28.message:
Fixed: Object tabs are causing "{1}" message in Error
    Console of Firefox 15 and above.

s29.message: Fixed handling of trailing dots in domain names (forum topic).
